name: Vegan Vs Non-Vegan
description:
Pick only vegan food on the left lane & non-vegan food on the right lane. Game Over if you miss anything!

A race between vegan & non-vegan in your mind. Make sure you keep the balance when you try to go for the highest score.

- SUPER-addictive
- Extremely simple game mechanics
- Choose Ad-free experience
- Beat your own high score!
